PROGRAM codeforces_299_A
    IMPLICIT NONE
    INTEGER :: n, i, j, min_idx, temp
    INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: a(:)
    
    ! Read input
    READ(*,*) n
    ALLOCATE(a(n))
    READ(*,*) a
    
    ! Sort array using selection sort
    DO i = 1, n -1
        min_idx = i
        DO j = i+1, n
            IF (a(j) < a(min_idx)) THEN
                min_idx = j
            END IF
        END DO
        ! Swap a(i) and a(min_idx)
        IF (min_idx /= i) THEN
            temp = a(i)
            a(i) = a(min_idx)
            a(min_idx) = temp
        END IF
    END DO
    
    ! The minimum is now at a(1)
    DO i = 1, n
        IF (MOD(a(i), a(1)) /=0 ) THEN
            PRINT *, -1
            STOP
        END IF
    END DO
    
    PRINT *, a(1)
    DEALLOCATE(a)
END PROGRAM
